text:
@realDonaldTrump In WW1 and WW2 there were no battles fought on US soil.

Covid-19 is all over the US, no matter how hard you try to deny it or ignore it.

You're not concerned about people cheating, you're scared sh**less about people voting!

#ResignNowTrump
